actionCalls.name: Notify_Opp_Owner_of_LF_Website_Visit
actionCalls.label: Notify Opp Owner of LF Website Visit

actionCalls.name: Resource_Panning_Requested_Notification_Public_Sector
actionCalls.label: Resource Panning Requested Notification - Public Sector

actionCalls.name: Resource_Planning_Requested_Notification_Private_Sector
actionCalls.label: Resource Planning Requested Notification - Private Sector

actionCalls.name: RFI_Bid_No_Bid_Requested_Notification_Private
actionCalls.label: RFI Bid/No Bid Requested Notification - Private

actionCalls.name: RFI_Bid_No_Bid_Requested_Notification_Public
actionCalls.label: RFI - Bid/No Bid Requested Notification - Public

actionCalls.name: RFP_Bid_No_Bid_Requested_Notification_Private
actionCalls.label: RFP Bid/No Bid Requested Notification - Private

actionCalls.name: RFP_Bid_No_Bid_Requested_Notification_Public
actionCalls.label: RFP - Bid/No Bid Requested Notification - Public

actionCalls.name: Send_UKI_IT_Support_Request_Notification
actionCalls.label: Send UKI IT Support Request Notification

actionCalls.name: Submit_for_RFP_Bid_No_Bid_Approval
actionCalls.label: Submit for RFP Bid/No Bid Approval

value.stringValue: {!$Record.Owner.Full_Name__c} has requested an RFP Bid/No Bid call.

assignments.description: Assign highest value incumbent to Opportunity Lookup
assignments.name: Add_to_Collection_and_assign_highest_value_to_Opportunity_lookup
assignments.label: Add to Collection and assign highest value to Opportunity lookup

assignments.name: Add_to_Collection_and_Populate_Opportunity
assignments.label: Add to Collection and Populate Opportunity

decisions.description: Check if Bid is already created
decisions.name: Bid_Exist
decisions.label: Bid Exist?

decisions.description: If either of the RFI Bid/No Bid or RFP Bid/No Bid Approvals were completed then update the Bid's Stage accordingly.
decisions.name: Bid_No_Bid_Approval_Completed_Decision
decisions.label: Bid/No Bid Approval Completed?

decisions.description:
If the Opportunity is automatically submitted for Bid/No Bid Approval (regardless of RFI or RFP) then send the notification to the required Bid Team. This is when either the RFI Bid/No Bid Approval Status or the RFP Bid/No Bid Approval Status fields are updated to Submitted.
The notifications were previously sent directly to the assignee but the Bid Team subsequently requested that the notifications about Private Bids go to a Private Team Shared Mailbox and the Public to a Public Team Shared Mailbox. As such the notifications are now sent from here rather than from an Approval Process.
decisions.name: Bid_No_Bid_Requested_Decision
decisions.label: Bid/No Bid Requested?

decisions.description: Which Team to send the Bid/No Bid Requested notification to?
decisions.name: Bid_No_Bid_Requested_Notification_Team_Decision
decisions.label: Bid/No Bid Requested Notification Team?

decisions.description: For Rebid/Extension Opportunities with Stage = Lost/Withdrawn that relate to a Contract with Pending Termination/Terminated when the Opp Closed Reason is updated update the Termination Reason on the Contract.
decisions.name: Closed_Reason_Change_Update_Terminated_Contract
decisions.label: Closed Reason Change Update Terminated Contract?

rules.name: Yes_Update_Contract_Termination_Reason_Outcome
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4) AND 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND 8
rules.label: Yes - Update Contract

decisions.description: If either RFI or RFP Compliance Review is Approved then check if Bid Exists. If Bid doesn't exist then create.
decisions.name: Compliance_Review_Approved
decisions.label: Compliance Review Approved?

decisions.description:
If the Opp has not already triggered the Contract Generation Subflow (Contract -> Latest Won Opportunity != Record ID) and has just been moved to 7.2 T&Cs Signed or Create Missing Contract tickbox is TRUE then follow Contract Generation Path. Otherwise bypass Contract Generation.
Do NOT do Contract Generation where Type = Upsell or Cross-sell.
Do NOT do Contract Generation where Corporate Type = Automotive.
decisions.name: Contract_Generation_or_Skip
decisions.label: Contract Generation or Skip?

decisions.description: Check that Contract is not already terminated.
decisions.name: Contract_Not_Already_Terminated_Decision
decisions.label: Contract Not Already Terminated?

decisions.description: For an Open Rebid/Extension Opportunity where the Contract is changed and the Contract does not already relate to this Opportunity via the Renewal Opportunity lookup field then update the Contract to set the Renewal Opportunity lookup field to be this Triggering Opportunity.
decisions.name: Contract_Renewal_Opportunity_Update_Required_Decision
decisions.label: Contract Renewal Opportunity Update Required?

decisions.description: Does the Campaign Influence Collection Variable hold records for creation? If so continue, otherwise skip.
decisions.name: Create_Influence_Decision
decisions.label: Create Influence Decision

decisions.description: If Missing Contract field is ticked then stop here. Otherwise continue.
decisions.name: Create_Missing_Contract_Ticked_Decision
decisions.label: Create Missing Contract Ticked?

decisions.description: If the Record has just been updated to Closed Won then create Winning Competitor. Not for future updates to the Record.
decisions.name: Create_Winning_Competitor_Decision
decisions.label: Create Winning Competitor?

decisions.description: If Open Bid Phases that work has not started on are identified then automatically close these down as Cancelled. Any that are Active/Start Date not in the future then exclude these - they will be manually closed by the Bid Team to ensure data quality.
decisions.name: Eligible_Open_Bid_Phases_Found_Decision
decisions.label: Eligible Open Bid Phases Found?

decisions.description: Has the Opportunity been closed with a Closed Reason that is eligible to allow the Contract to be terminated?
decisions.name: Eligible_Termination_Reason
decisions.label: Eligible Closure Reason?

decisions.description: Check if Emails are enabled for the running user before sending notification
decisions.name: Emails_Enabled_LF_Notification_Decision
decisions.label: Emails Enabled? (LF Notification)

decisions.description: Which price book is necessary per COrp TYpe of record
decisions.name: Evaluate_Corporate_Type
decisions.label: Price Book Decision

decisions.description: Exclude Campaigns related to Salesforce Sync so Campaign Influence records are not created for these.
decisions.name: Exclude_Campaign
decisions.label: Exclude Campaign?

decisions.description: Do the Head of Bid and Bid Manager fields on Opp align with the fields on Bid? If not then update the Bid with the new value.
decisions.name: Head_of_Bid_Or_Bid_Manager_Update_Needed_Decision
decisions.label: Head of Bid/Bid Manager Update Needed? (Bid)

decisions.description: If the # LF Website Visits is incremented (Current value > Prior Value), the Opp is Open and the Owner is Active then send a notification to the Opp Owner.
decisions.name: LF_Website_Visit_Notification_Decision
decisions.label: LF Website Visit Notification?

decisions.description: If the Opportunity is Closed Lost/Withdrawn, we then need to generate a new Continuous Improvement record
decisions.name: Opportunity_Closed_Lost_Withdrawn
decisions.label: Opportunity Closed Lost/Withdrawn?

decisions.description: If the Opp has a Bid associated to it and the Opp and Bid Owners do not align then change the Bid Owner to align with the Opp Owner.
decisions.name: Owner_Changed_Bid_Decision
decisions.label: Owner Changed? (Bid)

decisions.description: If the Opp Owner was changed and the Opp has Bid Phases associated to it then update the owner of the bid phase records.
decisions.name: Owner_Changed_Bid_Phases_Decision
decisions.label: Owner Changed? (Bid Phases)

decisions.description: If the Owner is changed then evaluate whether any associated updates need to happen too.
decisions.name: Owner_Changed_Decision
decisions.label: Owner Changed?

decisions.description:
Is the Opp Owner changed and the Opp has Services associated?
If so then update the owner on the Opp Services that used to relate to the existing Opp Owner. Do not update Opp Services that did not used to be owned by the existing Opp Owner.
decisions.name: Owner_Changed_Services_Decision
decisions.label: Owner Changed? (Services)

decisions.description: If the Opportunity was previously won, then we need to delete the winning competitor as this is no longer valid.
decisions.name: Previously_Won
decisions.label: Previously Won?

decisions.description: Was the Campaign lookup populated on the Opp record (mapped from Lead) and does the Opportunity have a Lead ID? If so then get Campaign Member records from the Lead and loop through them to create the Campaign Influence records making sure to exclude Salesforce Sync Campaign Member records.
decisions.name: Primary_Campaign_LeadID_Populated_Decision
decisions.label: Primary Campaign + Lead ID Populated?

decisions.description: If the Opp Type = Rebid/Extension (Renewal) and the Opportunity is linked to a Contract then Terminate the Contract and its Line Items.
decisions.name: Renewal_Opp_Linked_to_Contract
decisions.label: Renewal Opp Linked to Contract?

decisions.description: If the newly created Opp Type = Extension/Rebid and it is linked to a Contract then update the Renewal Opportunity field on Contract with the newly created opp if it's not already done.
decisions.name: Renewal_Opp_with_Contract_Link_Decision
decisions.label: Renewal Opp with Contract Link?

decisions.description: If the 'Include in Resource Planning' tickbox was checked and the Bid Team is populated then send a notification to the appropriate Bid Team.
decisions.name: Resource_Planning_Requested_Decision
decisions.label: Resource Planning Requested?

decisions.description: Should the notification be sent for RFI or for RFP to the Private Team?
decisions.name: RFI_or_RFP_Bid_No_Bid_Private_Decision
decisions.label: RFI or RFP? (Private)

decisions.description: Should the notification be sent for RFI or for RFP to the Public Team?
decisions.name: RFI_or_RFP_Public_Decision
decisions.label: RFI or RFP? (Public)

decisions.description: If the Bid already existed and the RFP Compliance Review was just approved then submit the Bid for RFP Bid/No Bid approval
decisions.name: RFP_Compliance_Review_Decision
decisions.label: RFP Compliance Review?

decisions.description: If Sub Stage is changed trigger the Opportunity Stage History Subflow
decisions.name: Sub_Stage_Changed_Decision
decisions.label: Sub Stage Changed?

decisions.description: If the Sub Stage was moved to 7.2 T&Cs Signed then evaluate the requirement to create a Contract. Otherwise Continue.
decisions.name: Sub_Stage_Moved_to_7_2_T_Cs_Signed_Decision
decisions.label: Sub Stage Moved to 7.2 T&Cs Signed?

formulas.description: Formula to return the date 7 days before today's date. Used in logic to ensure Lead Forensics Notifications are only sent once every 7 days.
formulas.name: f_7_Days_Ago

formulas.description: Substitute the OPP- prefix for BID- prefix. This standardises the number between Opp and Bid. Example: OPP-0001 convert to BID-0001
formulas.name: f_Bid_Reference

formulas.description: The day before the Opportunity Contract Start Date value.
formulas.name: f_Day_Before_Contract_Start

loops.description: Use the loop to get 1 item out of filtered collection
loops.name: Loop_Filtered_Pricebook_Collection
loops.label: Loop Filtered Pricebook Collection

recordCreates.description: When an Opportunity is Closed Won, we can default the Winning Competitor to be the OCS Account
recordCreates.name: Create_Winning_Competitor_Account_Role
recordCreates.label: Create Winning Competitor Account Role

recordLookups.description: Get any existing Campaign Influence records that relate to the same Campaign Influence Model and same Campaign to avoid duplicates.
recordLookups.name: Check_Existing_Influence
recordLookups.label: Check Existing Influence

recordLookups.description: Query all Account Role records that relate to the Lead
recordLookups.name: Get_All_Account_Roles
recordLookups.label: Get All Account Roles

recordLookups.description:
Get any Open Bid Phases that have not yet reached their Start Date/not yet Active. If any are found then close these down automatically as Cancelled.
For Active Bid Phases do not change the Status and let the Head of Bid/Client Solutions team manage these manually to ensure data quality.
recordLookups.name: Get_Open_Bid_Phases_Pre_Start_Date
recordLookups.label: Get Open Bid Phases Pre-Start Date

recordUpdates.description: Update Bid Stage to RFI now RFI Bid/No Bid has been approved.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Bid_Stage_RFI
recordUpdates.label: Set Bid Stage = RFI

recordUpdates.description: Update Bid Stage to RFP now RFP Bid/No Bid has been approved.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Bid_Stage_RFP
recordUpdates.label: Set Bid Stage = RFP

recordUpdates.description: Set the 'Renewal Opportunity' field on the related Contract with this Opportunity Id.
recordUpdates.name: Set_Renewal_Opp_on_Contract
recordUpdates.label: Set Renewal Opp on Contract

recordUpdates.description: Terminate the linked Contract with Termination Date the day before this Opportunity's Contract Start Date.
recordUpdates.name: Terminate_Contract
recordUpdates.label: Terminate Contract

recordUpdates.description: Update Owner of the Bid Phase records
recordUpdates.name: Update_Bid_Phase_Owners
recordUpdates.label: Update Bid Phase Owners

recordUpdates.description: Update Renewal Opportunity field on Contract with the value of the newly created Opportunity.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Contract_Renewal_Opp
recordUpdates.label: Update Contract Renewal Opp

recordUpdates.description: Update Head of Bid and/or Bid Manager on Bid Record
recordUpdates.name: Update_Head_of_Bid_Bid_Manager_Bid
recordUpdates.label: Update Bid Manager/Head of Bid (Bid)

recordUpdates.description: Update the owner on any Opp Services that previously aligned to the Opp Owner or did not have an Owner previously. If the Opp Service was not owned by the previous Opp Owner then do nothing.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Service_Owners
recordUpdates.label: Update Service Owners

subflows.description:
Subflow to either create a new Contract, update an existing Contract (Rebid/Extension) or take no action for Cross-Sell/Upsell.
Also responsible for creation of/update to Contract Terms record against the Contract with the values set on Opportunity.
subflows.name: Contract_Generation_Subflow
subflows.label: Contract Generation Subflow

subflows.description: If there is no OCS Account to assign to, then we create an Error Log of type Warning to inform the admin users that the OCS Account needs to be configured
subflows.name: Create_Warning
subflows.label: Create Warning

value.stringValue: The system has attempted to assign the Winning Competitor, but there is no OCS Account in the system to assign to. Please configure this and update any Closed Won Opportunities.

subflows.description: Launch Subflow to generate Opportunity Stage History records as appropriate.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Stage_History_Subflow_Create
subflows.label: Opportunity Stage History Subflow (Create)

subflows.description: Launch Subflow to generate Opportunity Stage History records as appropriate.
subflows.name: Opportunity_Stage_History_Subflow_Update
subflows.label: Opportunity Stage History Subflow (Update)

textTemplates.name: t_HighDealAlertAPAC
textTemplates.text:
{!c_ocsLogo}

Hi Team, 


This high value Opportunity has recently closed in {!$Record.Owner.Country}, please see below for further details.


  • Opportunity Name: {!$Record.Name}
  • Closed Stage: {!$Record.StageName}
  • Sub-Stage: {!$Record.Sub_Stage__c}
  • Close Date: {!$Record.CloseDate}
  • Opportunity Owner: {!$Record.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner.LastName}


The Annual Contractual Revenue is {!$Record.Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c}, with an Annual Ad-Hoc Revenue of {!$Record.Annual_Ad_hoc_Revenue__c}.


Thanks,

OCS

textTemplates.name: t_HighDealAlertUKI1
textTemplates.text:
{!c_ocsLogo}

Hi Team, 


This high value Opportunity has recently closed in {!$Record.Owner.Region__c}, please see below for further details.


  • Opportunity Name: {!$Record.Name}
  • Closed Stage: {!$Record.StageName}
  • Sub-Stage: {!$Record.Sub_Stage__c}
  • Close Date: {!$Record.CloseDate}
  • Opportunity Owner: {!$Record.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner.LastName}


The Annual Contractual Revenue is {!$Record.Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c}, with an Annual Ad-Hoc Revenue of {!$Record.Annual_Ad_hoc_Revenue__c}.


Thanks,

OCS

variables.description: Single Record for mapping to then add to Collection before creation.
variables.name: v_CampaignInfluence_Single

variables.description: Variable to hold the User ID of the user who will own the new bid. Either the Head of Bid (if available) or otherwise the Opp Owner.
variables.name: v_New_Bid_Owner

variables.description: Name to use to filter Price Book (either FM or Automotive)
variables.name: v_pricebook_name
